Title: Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) [GPS 40mm] Smartwatch with Starlight Aluminum Case with Starlight Sport Band S/M. Fitness & Sleep Tracker, Crash Detection, Heart Rate Monitor
Description:
About this item    WHY APPLE WATCH SE — All the essentials to help you be motivated and active, keep connected, track your health, and stay safe. The Smart Stack and redesigned apps in watchOS 10 help you see more information at a glance. With features like Crash Detection and enhanced workout metrics, Apple Watch SE is a better value than ever.    CARBON NEUTRAL — Apple Watch SE (2nd generation) paired with the latest Sport Loop is carbon neutral. Learn more about Apple’s commitment to the environment at apple.com/2030.    HEALTH AND SAFETY FEATURES — Get help when you need it with Fall Detection, Crash Detection, and Emergency SOS. Get deep insights into your health, including notifications if you have an irregular heart rhythm or an unusually high or low heart rate.    SIMPLY COMPATIBLE — It works seamlessly with your Apple devices and services. Unlock your Mac automatically. Find your devices easily. Pay and send money with Apple Pay. Apple Watch requires iPhone XS or later with the latest iOS version.    SWIMPROOF AND STYLISH — 50m water resistance. Three finishes. And a color-matched back case made with a production process that reduces its carbon emissions.    EASILY CUSTOMIZABLE — With watch bands in a range of styles, materials, and colors and fully customizable watch faces, you can change your watch to fit your mood or the moment.    A POWERFUL FITNESS PARTNER — The Workout app gives you a range of ways to train plus advanced metrics for more insights about your workout performance. And Apple Watch comes with three months of Apple Fitness+ free.    
   STAY CONNECTED — Send a text, take a call, listen to music and podcasts, use Siri, or call for help with Emergency SOS. Apple Watch SE (GPS) works with your iPhone or Wi-Fi to keep you connected. APPLECARE — Every Apple Watch comes with one year of hardware repair coverage through its limited warranty and up to 90 days of complimentary technical support. Get AppleCare+ to extend your coverage and reduce the stress and cost of unexpected repairs. LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See below to learn more.   Show more

Reviews.author: ZoeyNH
Reviews.content:
My prior watch was the Apple Watch 5. This is a sweet upgrade. It’s fast, sturdy, responsive, the battery lasts me into day two (I keep WiFi off unless needed it’s a battery drainer). The only function this SE2 doesn’t have is ECG and O2 sensor. I only rarely used those on my watch 5 anyways. Everything else is great, workouts, steps, heart rate and fall and crash detection, and more. I pair it with a hard case protector and a braided band. The only downside is I have an IPhone 8 Plus I adore but because this watch ships with watch os10 it will only pair with IPhone X and up running IOS 17, so I had to pair it with an IPhone 13 I had but wasn’t using.  This watch is so worth it and for much less than the fancy ones Apple sells. Buy it!
Read more
Reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2024

Title: Apple Watch Series 9 [GPS 45mm] Smartwatch with Midnight Aluminum Case with Midnight Sport Loop One Size. Fitness Tracker, ECG Apps, Always-On Retina Display, Carbon Neutral
Description:
About this item    CARBON NEUTRAL — An aluminum Apple Watch Series 9 paired with the latest Sport Loop is carbon neutral. Learn more about Apple’s commitment to the environment at apple.com/2030.    WHY APPLE WATCH SERIES 9 — Your essential companion for a healthy life is now even more powerful. The S9 chip enables a superbright display and a magical new way to quickly and easily interact with your Apple Watch without touching the screen. Advanced health, safety, and activity features provide powerful insights and help when you need it. And redesigned apps in watchOS give you more information at a glance.    ADVANCED HEALTH FEATURES — Take an ECG anytime. Get notifications if you have an irregular heart rhythm. See how much time you spent in REM, Core, or Deep sleep with sleep stages. Temperature sensing provides insights into overall wellbeing and cycle tracking. And take note of your state of mind to help build emotional awareness and resilience.    A POWERFUL FITNESS PARTNER — The Workout app gives you a range of ways to train plus advanced metrics for more insights about your workout performance. And Apple Watch comes with three months of Apple Fitness+ free.    INNOVATIVE SAFETY FEATURES — Fall Detection and Crash Detection can connect you with emergency services in the event of a hard fall or a severe car crash. And Emergency SOS lets you call for help with the press of a button.    SIMPLY COMPATIBLE — It works seamlessly with your Apple devices and services. Unlock your Mac automatically. Get approximate distance and directions to your iPhone with Precision Finding on supported iPhone models. Pay and send money with Apple Pay. Apple Watch requires iPhone XS or later with the latest iOS version.    EASILY CUSTOMIZABLE — With watch bands in a range of styles, materials, and colors and fully customizable watch faces, you can change your watch to fit your mood or the moment.    
   INCREDIBLE DURABILITY — Tougher than tough. It’s crack resistant, IP6X-certified dust resistant, and swimproof with 50m water resistance. STAY CONNECTED — Send a text, take a call, listen to music and podcasts, use Siri, and get notifications on the go. Apple Watch Series 9 (GPS) works with your iPhone or Wi-Fi to keep you connected. LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See below to learn more.   Show more

Reviews.author: Aryeh Wizman
Reviews.content:
I recently upgraded to the Apple Watch Series 9 [GPS 41mm], and I couldn't be more impressed! From its sleek design to its incredible functionality, this smartwatch has quickly become an essential part of my daily routine.First off, let's talk about style. The pink aluminum case with the light pink sport band looks absolutely stunning on my wrist. It's stylish enough to wear with any outfit, whether I'm hitting the gym or heading to a business meeting. Plus, the lightweight design makes it comfortable to wear all day long.But it's not just about looks – this watch is packed with features that make my life so much easier. The GPS functionality allows me to track my runs and hikes with pinpoint accuracy, while the heart rate monitor helps me keep tabs on my health and fitness goals. I love being able to receive notifications right on my wrist, so I never miss an important call or message, even when my phone is out of reach.The battery life is impressive too. I can go a full day on a single charge with plenty of juice to spare, even with constant use. And when it does need to be charged, the magnetic charging cable makes it a breeze to power up.As Mother's Day approaches, I can't help but think what a perfect gift the Apple Watch Series 9 would make for any mom. It's not just a stylish accessory – it's a practical tool that can help her stay organized, motivated, and connected. Whether she's a fitness enthusiast, a busy professional, or simply someone who deserves a little extra pampering, this smartwatch is sure to put a smile on her face.The Apple Watch Series 9 has truly become my ultimate companion. Whether I'm staying on top of my fitness goals, staying connected with friends and family, or simply checking the time, this smartwatch does it all – and it looks good doing it. If you're in the market for a new smartwatch, look no further than the Apple Watch Series 9. It's stylish, functional, and simply amazing – the perfect Mother's Day gift!
Read more
Reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2024

Title: Apple Watch Series 5 (GPS + Cellular, 40MM) - Gold Aluminum Case with Pink Sport Band (Renewed)
Description: About this item    This is a RENEWED product and comes in a generic box    Electrical and optical heart sensors    GPS + Cellular    Always-On Retina display

Reviews.author: Carl
Reviews.content:
I plan on upgrading soon but I have had this for about a year now, and it's battery life after constant use is still pretty good, it lasts for the day and still has about like 50% of battery when I go to bed after a long day,  I get up and put it on at like 05:00 and take it off to put it charge right before bed around 22:00. It is kind of small but that is alright. It is good quality and worth what I spent.
Read more
Reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2024

Title: Apple Watch Series 4 (GPS, 44MM) - Space Gray Aluminum Case with Black Sport Band (Renewed)
Description: About this item    64-bit dual-core S4 processor. Up to 2x faster than S3 processor    Electrical heart sensor (ECG app)    Second-generation optical heart sensor    Fall detection    Digital Crown with haptic feedback

Reviews.author: Panda Pandemic
Reviews.content:
I was extremely worried about buying a refurbished watch from Amazon. I wanted to buy from Apple, but the cheapest refurbished watch they had was $339.00 and I'm just unwilling to pay those prices for a watch. I had a Series 2 from January 2018 - fall 2021, when the watch face simple fell open (I was appalled but I don't blame the watch, I wore it all day every day during that period of time. It got me through 60 lb weight loss, I'm surprised it made it that long).Watch arrived today. I will note that it took a really long time to charge. That is the con here, it took about an hour to charge to 68% which suggests that either - it takes Series 4 longer to charge, or there may be a battery issue here.Besides that, the watch is in great condition. There is one tiny ding at the very top of the watch. You only notice it if you have your eyeball an inch from the watch, like I did. Otherwise, no scratches or defects on the watch screen or in the watch when it is powered up (I saw others had dots or other irregularities in their refurbished watch screens - none on this one). The watch set up and paired to my phone without any problems. I have been unable to set up cellular - I keep getting an error. This may be an AT&T issue, I'm not sure yet. Despite this being a 4 year old watch, it doesn't feel like a 4 year old watch. It's new TO ME. I like the new features (ECG, the slightly bigger screen DOES make a difference .. I always put my passcode in wrong at least 2x with the Series 2, with this that issue is gone).I'll revisit this review after I've had it a while, or uncovered answers to any of my other issues. As a note, my seller was The Camera Guyz in Brooklyn NY. My delivery date was initially towards the end of next week, next Thursday (I ordered yesterday, Friday)... watch came within 24 hours.
Read more
Reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2022

Description:

LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See below to learn more.   Show more

Reviews.author: Anon
Reviews.content:
After I got my first iPhone in October, my Fitbit app barely worked. Took forever to refresh and I couldn’t even see weather or sleep.Apple Watch is amazing. It’s beautiful. It lasts thru a night of sleep and a run per day. Charges fast. I can make calls and messages from my wrist and place emergency calls. I’m never without my phone so I don’t need cellular, it functions via Bluetooth. I can control what’s playing from my wrist, see stocks, check email if needed, track mood, and I set up my watch face for ultimate self help using the “I Am” affirmations app. Also, heart rate to remember I’m alive, bear app which is notes with voice dictation (works great), voice note and mindfulness (which has mindful modules but also log your mood/state with detailed emotion options). It’s really great. The watch just WORKS. Makes Fitbit look like a hunk of garbage. I feel safer too since watch has fall detection (I’m a runner), tracks location on find my phone for my parents, has photos (I can view up to 500 so I keep an SOS mental health folder of images and snippet that calm me down), maps (really important for walking without phone out). The alarm is great, best of all it syncs perfectly with my phone so if I have maps on my phone on silent I still get a buzz before directions so I can mute instructions but not have to look down at phone wondering when my next turn is. Has reminders app, audible, cycle tracking. The Apple health app is a league above anything I’ve ever seen.The exercise app gives a huge amount of data for running (cadence, heart rate, elevation gain and loss, pace) and you can use other apps while during a workout ie check messages or place call during a long run.It has great sleep data and is much more accurate than Fitbit who tries to make you pay for same data. Fitbit even erased the community function while Apple fitness allows you to see others workout and compete.Love!!Update- I got an otterbox pink/red watch case and Lerobo wine red watch band. Loving it- the original band is okay but I prefer to customize and this is more comfortable.
Read more
Reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023

Title: Apple Watch Series 6 (GPS, 40mm) - Silver Aluminum Case with White Sport Band (Renewed)
Description: About this item    LEAVE YOUR PHONE IN YOUR POCKET: Apple Watch Series 6 GPS Model lets you call, text, and get directions from your wrist, while leaving your phone in your pocket. It offers multiple connectivity options, including: Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and NFC to suit all of your possible needs.    ALWAYS-ON RETINA DISPLAY: You no longer need to raise your wrist or touch the screen to see the time or other information on your watch face, because the display never sleeps. All you need to do is glance to find the time or your workout metrics right there where you want them.    ECG ON YOUR WRIST: With the ECG app, Apple Watch Series 6 is capable of generating an ECG similar to a single-lead electrocardiogram. It’s a momentous achievement for a wearable device that can provide data for doctors and peace of mind for you wherever may be during the day.    WORKOUTS THAT DON'T QUIT: Cycling, yoga, swimming, high-intensity interval training.the list goes on. You me it, Apple Watch measures it. Set workout-specific goals, see full summaries when you’re done, and track how you’re trending over time in the Activity app on your iPhone.    GET LOST IN YOUR MUSIC: With Apple Music on your wrist, you’ve got 60 million tracks of musical motivation to take you places. You can also catch up on the latest podcasts or listen to an audiobook if that's your thing. Stream everything you need right from your watch, even without your phone.

Reviews.author: Nadira Najm-Cary
Reviews.content:
I got this watch for my sister because this is the last version that had the blood oxygen patent and she absolutely loves it! Worth every penny!
Read more
Reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2024

Title: Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) (GPS, 40mm) - Starlight Aluminum Case with Starlight Sport Band, S/M (Renewed)
Description: About this item    This pre-owned product is not Apple certified, but has been professionally inspected, tested and cleaned by Amazon-qualified suppliers.    There will be no visible cosmetic imperfections when held at an arm’s length. There will be no visible cosmetic imperfections when held at an arm’s length.    This product will have a battery which exceeds 80% capacity relative to new.    Accessories will not be original, but will be compatible and fully functional. Product may come in generic Box.    This product is eligible for a replacement or refund within 90 days of receipt if you are not satisfied.

Reviews.author: StepFrank
Reviews.content:
The watch itself is in perfect condition. The seller even upgraded my watch to the cellular version at no extra charge! That was a nice surprise, and now I’ll have that option if I ever want it without having to buy a new watch.  It was easy to set up and link with my Apple account. The charger that came with the watch gets extremely hot when charging, so I did buy a new charging station that can charge my phone and watch at the same time. So far I get about a day and a half of wear time before I have to charge it. There are some functions of the Apple Watch that I don’t love, but that has nothing to do with this seller or this particular watch; overall this watch is in perfect condition and works as it should.
Read more
Reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2024

Title: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch with Rugged Titanium Case & Blue/Black Trail Loop S/M. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life, Carbon Neutral
Description:
About this item    CARBON NEUTRAL — Apple Watch Ultra 2 paired with the latest Alpine Loop or Trail Loop is carbon neutral. Learn more about Apple’s commitment to the environment at apple.com/2030.    WHY APPLE WATCH ULTRA 2 — Rugged, capable, and built to meet the demands of endurance athletes, outdoor adventurers, and water sport enthusiasts — with a specialized band for each. The S9 SiP enables a superbright display and a magical new way to quickly and easily interact with your Apple Watch without touching the display. Up to 36 hours of battery life and 72 hours in Low Power Mode.    EXTREMELY RUGGED, INCREDIBLY CAPABLE — 49mm corrosion-resistant titanium case. Large Digital Crown and Customizable Action button for instant control over a variety of functions. 100m water resistance.    BIGGEST, BRIGHTEST DISPLAY YET — Apple’s brightest Always-On Retina display is easy to see, even in direct sunlight. More room for adding complications to customize your watch face and enough space to view six metrics at once.    THE FREEDOM OF CELLULAR — Cellular is built in. You can call and text without your iPhone, even overseas with international roaming. Stream your favorite music and podcasts. Get directions with Maps.    FOR ATHLETES — Advanced metrics and views in the Workout app, including Heart Rate Zones, custom workouts, and new cycling workout views. Precision dual-frequency GPS provides incredible accuracy for calculating distance, pace, and route maps. Trail Loop is a light, thin, and flexible band, designed especially for all workout types.    FOR OUTDOOR ADVENTURERS — The Compass app delivers helpful views and details like elevation, incline, longitude, and latitude. See the last place where you had cellular reception. Mark your location with Compass Waypoints. Backtrack uses GPS to map where you’ve been so you can retrace your steps. Alpine Loop is an extremely rugged and secure band to meet the needs of all outdoor adventurers.    
   FOR WATER SPORTS ENTHUSIASTS — Made for recreational water sports, scuba, and free diving for descents to 40 meters. The Depth app shows the time, current depth, water temperature, duration under water, and maximum depth you’ve reached. The Oceanic+ app puts a dive computer on your wrist. Ocean Band is light and flexible, with a titanium buckle and adjustable loop for a secure fit even during high-speed water sports. ADVANCED HEALTH AND SAFETY FEATURES — Heart health notifications and the ECG app keep you informed and empowered when it comes to your health. Fall Detection and Crash Detection can connect you with emergency services in the event of a hard fall or a severe car crash. Hold the Action button to activate a siren that can be heard up to 600 feet away. LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See below to learn more.   Show more

Title: Apple Watch Series 6 (GPS, 40mm) - Gold Aluminum Case with Pink Sand Sport Band (Renewed)
Description: About this item    LEAVE YOUR PHONE IN YOUR POCKET: Apple Watch Series 6 GPS Model lets you call, text, and get directions from your wrist, while leaving your phone in your pocket. It offers multiple connectivity options, including: Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and NFC to suit all of your possible needs.    ALWAYS-ON RETINA DISPLAY: You no longer need to raise your wrist or touch the screen to see the time or other information on your watch face, because the display never sleeps. All you need to do is glance to find the time or your workout metrics right there where you want them.    ECG ON YOUR WRIST: With the ECG app, Apple Watch Series 6 is capable of generating an ECG similar to a single-lead electrocardiogram. It's a momentous achievement for a wearable device that can provide data for doctors and peace of mind for you wherever may be during the day.    WORKOUTS THAT DON'T QUIT: Cycling, yoga, swimming, high-intensity interval training...the list goes on. You name it, Apple Watch measures it. Set workout-specific goals, see full summaries when you're done, and track how you're trending over time in the Activity app on your iPhone.    GET LOST IN YOUR MUSIC: With Apple Music on your wrist, you've got 60 million tracks of musical motivation to take you places. You can also catch up on the latest podcasts or listen to an audiobook if that's your thing. Stream everything you need right from your watch, even without your phone.

Reviews.author: El Director
Reviews.content:
I was a little hesitant at first to purchase this refurbed, four year old Apple Watch, but I'm glad I did!  The watch looked like it was brand new, not a scratch or scuff on it.  The only sign of its age is that the battery is at 90% capacity.  Even so, I still end the day with at least 30-40% juice remaining.  That's with two workouts and mild use of the watch throughout the day.  Highly recommend!

Reviews.author: Cindy
Reviews.content:
Bought this for my fiancé for Valentine’s Day and he loved it! It was a great price for being used. Works great, battery life is awesome the only thing I was upset with was that the charger makes the watch very hot. I thought the chargers were universal so I used it for my watch and it doesn’t charge over 10% and ends up over heating my watch and shuts it down. The watch is 5/5 but the charger is 3/5 cause jt works for him but not for mine.

Title: Apple Watch Series 9 45mm (GPS + Cellular) Aluminum Black with Medium/Large Black Sport Band
Description:
About this item    WHY APPLE WATCH SERIES 9 — Your essential companion for a healthy life is now even more powerful. The S9 chip enables a superbright display and a magical new way to quickly and easily interact with your Apple Watch without touching the screen. Advanced health, safety, and activity features provide powerful insights and help when you need it. And redesigned apps in watchOS give you more information at a glance.    CARBON NEUTRAL — An aluminum Apple Watch Series 9 paired with the latest Sport Loop is carbon neutral. Learn more about Apple’s commitment to the environment at apple.com/2030.    CELLULAR CONNECTIVITY — Send a text, make a call, and stream music without your iPhone nearby. Use Family Setup to manage Apple Watch for family members who don’t yet have their own iPhone, so everyone can stay connected, active, healthy, and safe.    ADVANCED HEALTH FEATURES — Keep an eye on your blood oxygen. Take an ECG anytime. Get notifications if you have an irregular heart rhythm. See how much time you spent in REM, Core, or Deep sleep with sleep stages. Temperature sensing provides insights into overall wellbeing and cycle tracking. And take note of your state of mind to help build emotional awareness and resilience.    A POWERFUL FITNESS PARTNER — The Workout app gives you a range of ways to train plus advanced metrics for more insights about your workout performance. And Apple Watch comes with three months of Apple Fitness+ free.    INNOVATIVE SAFETY FEATURES — Fall Detection and Crash Detection can connect you with emergency services in the event of a hard fall or a severe car crash. And Emergency SOS lets you call for help with the press of a button.    SIMPLY COMPATIBLE — It works seamlessly with your Apple devices and services. Unlock your Mac automatically. Get approximate distance and directions to your iPhone with Precision Finding on supported iPhone models. Pay and send money with Apple Pay. Apple Watch requires iPhone XS or later with the latest iOS version.    
   EASILY CUSTOMIZABLE — With watch bands in a range of styles, materials, and colors and fully customizable watch faces, you can change your watch to fit your mood or the moment. INCREDIBLE DURABILITY — Tougher than tough. It’s crack resistant, IP6X-certified dust resistant, and swimproof with 50m water resistance. LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See below to learn more.   Show more

Reviews.author: Customer
Reviews.content:
I decided on a refurbished Apple Watch series 9 in order to get the oxygen sensor as well as to save some money. I watched some YouTube how-to videos before it arrived, and this paid off well.It arrived in the original box, but the strap had been attached-so I knew from the videos I watched that someone had at least tried it on.  I was actually glad the strap was attached as that was one less thing for me to do. The charging cord was in its original sealed bag, so it was brand new.The watch took about an hour to charge to the point that I could set it up. The set up was easy and fast. Having watched a few how-to videos before it arrived, made the set up effortless for me, and I am no techie.From the videos I had seen I knew to check to see if the software needed updating (it did) and if the battery had the ability to charge to 100% since it was a refurbished watch. I was relieved to see that the battery could be charged to 100%. If that had not been the case, I planned to send it back during the no shipping cost to return time.Well, I love the watch. Learning to use its basic features took little time. It’s a sophisticated watch and, with a plethora of available apps, it can help in many ways. So I keep learning more about using its many features. I bought a HeartWatch and an AutoSleep app which perfectly meet my needs. Each were under $10 for lifetime use – no subscription fees, no advertisements and they work amazingly well. Some of the other apps look questionable from their reviews. Subscription fees add up quickly, so I am avoiding all that completely without missing out on anything I want, so far.This watch has me exercising much more than I thought I was able to, feeling better and sometimes sleeping better. I wish I had bought one sooner.Update several weeks in: The pretty pink watch band is light and gets dirty very quickly. It is comfortable and easy to take on and off. I’m going to get a band in another color. The watch continues to work great and keeps helping me improve my fitness and sleep.
Read more
Reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2024

Reviews.author: Brandon
Reviews.content:
I received a great quality product in great condition. The watch came as advertised with no scratches on the glass, but it did have minor micro scuffs around the aluminum bezel that you would need a magnifying glass to see. It’s a used product and it’s not all the way flawless, but it’s in great condition. It also didn’t come with the original charging cord, but Amazon made the accommodations by including an aftermarket magnetic charging cable & charging block that both work well and charge the watch. Overall it was a great purchase at a very reasonable price.
